CustomField.description: For firms that no longer refer Paychex, DSMs will be contacting those firms to determine why they no longer refer. Referral Account sync field

CustomField.label: FY17 Referred Sales Decline Reason

value.fullName: Lack of availability of or satisfaction with my Paychex rep
value.label: Lack of availability of or satisfaction with my Paychex rep

value.fullName: I or my clients have experienced service issues
value.label: I or my clients have experienced service issues

value.fullName: My firm provides payroll processing services
value.label: My firm provides payroll processing services

value.fullName: I get paid by another payroll provider to refer to them
value.label: I get paid by another payroll provider to refer to them

value.fullName: I refer another payroll provider without compensation
value.label: I refer another payroll provider without compensation

value.fullName: I have had no clients that required your services
value.label: I have had no clients that required your services

value.fullName: I have referred Paychex whenever I have had the opportunity
value.label: I have referred Paychex whenever I have had the opportunity

value.fullName: I refer multiple options, including Paychex, and let the client decide
value.label: I refer multiple options, including Paychex, and let the client decide

value.fullName: Other (please describe in the Notes section of the Referral Account)
value.label: Other (please describe in the Notes section of the Referral Account)
